Blog.post: This site is amazin! Run by th same ppl as quiz ur friends, all u hav 2 do is keep holdin a button down with the mouse. My record is 56 mins, but hav 2 admit 2 cheatin lol. Try it at urlLink www.holdthebutton.com

My pictures from Poland are here at last! They arrived in th post yesterday, n yesterday eve n this morn has bin devoted 2 publishing them 4 UR benefit on th web. Ud betta b grateful! :P hehe. Sorry jenny, jus had 2 post that pic, check out th last pic at th Bohema restaurant guys :P. The pictures page is urlLink here . Please sign the guestbook.
Iv emailed most of u, but those hu iv missed, plz urlLink take my quiz and then urlLink check out the scoreboard! Make ur own quiz at urlLink www.quizyourfriends.com , its fun!
These pictures r taken by a friend, u can either get at them via urlLink Her Blog or direct from her page about our time in urlLink Poland .
urlLink Guess the Dictator or Sit-Com Character Check this site out guys - spooky!
You believe in Santa Claus. You don't believe in Santa Claus. You are Santa Claus. You look like Santa Claus.
How to shower like a woman Take off clothing and place it in sectioned laundry basket according to whites and coloureds. Walk to bathroom wearing long dressing gown.

urlLink This picture was taken in the Wieliczka salt mines near Krakow, Poland. More pics of the trip will follow once theyre developed, but had 2 pay 10 zlotti 4 this 1, as it was taken by th mine staff. Th salt mine is very interestin. If ur eva in Krakow, giv it a visit, lol. urlLink
A great site with no end of hilariously funny video clips. Just refresh the page 4 more. urlLink http://www.supanet.com/funnies
hi peeps im new 2 this blogging business jus thought id giv it a try.
Do you remember urlLink Frances the Firefly ? That cool lil cartoon th firemen gave out yrs ago? Theres a web page 4 it!

Hi ppl, sorry there havent been any updates 4 ages, iv been away for a week campin nr Whitby, North Yorks. Was gd fun, tho far 2 wet 4 my likin lol. Havent done any surfin since i got bak, so no fun links 4 u, sorry hehe. Was away 4 my bday as well, was an experience. Nothin like th sound of rain on a tent 2 wish u a happy bday lol. Na was ok, it dried up l8r, n i had a gd day.

Woo got back into CYO, was sure i wud, but u can neva b sure till th day. Had a friend last yr hu got moved from CTO bak 2 CSO, didnt realise that that actually happened until it happened 2 him. He was so pissed off he left lol. Moan time. 3 things: 1) Y is my post so slow? Sum ppl got their results on Wednesday, n here i am waitin til friday! 2) Y dont they put where ur theyve placed u in the orchestra on th letter? Even jus an indication of 1st or 2nd violins would help. Wud make so much more sense than makin every1 crowd around 1 tiny notice on th 1st rehearsal, n also it wud allow ppl 2 deal wiv their dissappointment/elation in a private place instead of in front of everybody. Stupid ppl. 3) Noooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo its Mr leech! I knew it was gonna b, but was hopin my source was mistaken! Evil man. Jus hope he doesnt know about this page lol.
This is a really funny spoof on th urlLink Windows environment.
